titleStmt.title: The reporte of a bloudie and terrible massacre in the citty of Mosco with the fearefull and tragicall end of Demetrius the last Duke, before him raigning at this present.
titleStmt.author: Russell, William, fl. 1607.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Val. Sims, for Samuel Macham, and Mathew Cooke, and are to be sold at their shop in Paules Churchyard, at the signe of the Tigers head,

notesStmt.note: Translation given to William Russell by BL Cat. See also Halkett and Laing (3rd ed.), p. 168.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: their shop in Paules Churchyard, at the signe of the Tigers head
